product_name: Pearl Izumi SELECT LTD Jersey - Men's
long_description: Got Colorado connections? You'll love the graphic on this men's Pearl Izumi SELECT LTD Jersey, as well as a fabric that wicks, dries fast and keeps you on top of your ride. SELECT Transfer fabric excels at transferring moisture off your skin so it evaporates quickly; offers UPF 40 sun protection. 12 in. front zipper maximizes venting options. Elasticized hem helps hold jersey in place. Pearl Izumi SELECT LTD Jersey provides 3 back pockets that stash energy snacks and more.
short_description: Got Colorado connections? You'll love the graphic on this men's Pearl Izumi SELECT LTD Jersey, as well as a fabric that wicks, dries fast and keeps you on top of your ride.
